metadata.title: CVE-2017-0555 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in libavc in Mediaserver couldenable a local malicious application to access data outside of itspermission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it could be usedto access data without permission. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1,7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-33551775.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
